meanings.definition: Small arthropod animals with six legs and a segmented body.
meanings.sent1: Insects are tiny creatures with six legs.
meanings.sent2: I saw many insects crawling on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was interrupted by a swarm of insects.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were bustling with insects scurrying around.
meanings.sent5: The colorful butterflies danced like delicate insects in the garden.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is annoying or causing trouble.
meanings.sent1: Some people can be real insects when they keep bothering you.
meanings.sent2: The constant buzzing sound was like an insect in my ear.
meanings.sent3: The persistent salesman was like an annoying insect that wouldn't go away.
meanings.sent4: Her nagging thoughts buzzed in her mind like pesky insects.
meanings.sent5: The broken alarm clock was an insect that disturbed his peaceful sleep.
